title: Replace Safran logo image with user-provided file

requirements.text: Replace the existing Safran header logo asset with the user-provided image, keeping the public path unchanged: `/assets/generated/safran-logo.dim_220x64.png` (as used by `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx`). The resulting image must be a clean, properly cropped/scaled logo that fits within 220x64 and renders clearly on both light and dark backgrounds (transparent background if possible).

quotes: Remplace l'image safran par celle ci

acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/safran-logo.dim_220x64.png` and is based on the user-uploaded logo image.
The app header displays the updated Safran logo without layout shifts or distortion (maintains the current sizing behavior from the `h-4 w-auto object-contain` styling).
No code changes are required to the `` usage in `AppShell.tsx` for the new logo to appear.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components).
Do not modify files listed as immutable paths in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`).
nonGoals: Changing any backend behavior or storage.
Redesigning the app header/navigation beyond updating the logo asset.

required: Safran logo wordmark on transparent background, tightly cropped and scaled to fit (safran-logo.dim_220x64.png)
edits: Use the uploaded image as the source and produce the app asset (png-clipart-safran-electronics-defense-labinal-logo-aerospace-outils-text-logo-thumbnail.png > safran-logo.dim_220x64.png)
